mapper.select: select category_id as categoryId, category_name as categoryName, parent_category_id as parentCategoryId from ticket_category
select local_id as localId, local_name as localName, parent_local_id as parentLocalId, local_filepath as localFilepath from local_category order by localName

select c1.category_name as categoryName, c2.category_name as parentCategoryName, l1.local_name as localName, l2.local_name as parentLocalName, ticket_no as ticketNo, t.local_id as localId, t.category_id as categoryId, member_no as memberNo, start_date as startDate, expire_date as expireDate, ticket_title as ticketTitle, ticket_content as ticketContent, important_content as importantContent, business_time as businessTime, business_addr as businessAddr, required_time as requiredTime, like_count as likeCount, ticket_score as ticketScore from ticket t join ticket_Category c1 on (t.category_id = c1.category_id) join ticket_category c2 on (c1.parent_category_id = c2.category_id) join local_category l1 on (t.local_id = l1.local_id) join local_category l2 on (l1.parent_local_id = l2.local_id) where ticket_no=#{ticketNo}

select opt_no as optNo, ticket_no as ticketNo, opt_title as optTitle, opt_content as optContent, opt_price as optPrice, opt_discount_rate as optDiscountRate, opt_discount_price as optDiscountPrice, opt_stock as optStock from ticket_option where ticket_No = #{ticketNo}

select ticket_no as ticketNo, place_filepath as placeFilepath, ticket_filepath1 as ticketFilepath1, ticket_filepath2 as ticketFilepath2, ticket_filepath3 as ticketFilepath3, ticket_filepath4 as ticketFilepath4 from ticket_file where ticket_No = #{ticketNo}
select member_point as memberPoint from member where member_No = #{memberNo}
select reserve_no as reserveNo from ticket_reserve where pay_No = #{payNo}
mapper.update: update member set member_point=#{updatePoint} where member_no=#{memberNo}
update couponuse set coupon_state=1 where member_no=#{memberNo} and coupon_no=#{couponNo}
mapper.select: select t.ticket_no as ticketNo, ticket_title as ticketTitle , ticket_filepath1 as ticketFilepath1 from ticket t join ticket_file f on (t.ticket_no = f.ticket_no) where t.ticket_No = #{ticketNo}

select a.reserve_no as reserveNo, a.opt_no as optNo, opt_quantity as optQuantity, op.opt_title as optTitle, op.opt_price as optPrice from (select * from option_reserve where reserve_no = #{reserveNo})a join ticket_option op on (a.opt_no = op.opt_no)

select * from (select c2.category_name as parentCategoryName, l1.local_name as localName, l2.local_name as parentLocalName, ticket_no as ticketNo, ticket_title as ticketTitle, required_time as requiredTime, ticket_score as ticketScore from ticket t join ticket_Category c1 on (t.category_id = c1.category_id) join ticket_category c2 on (c1.parent_category_id = c2.category_id) join local_category l1 on (t.local_id = l1.local_id) join local_category l2 on (l1.parent_local_id = l2.local_id))tinfo join (select ticket_no as ticketNo, opt_title as optTitle, opt_price as optPrice, opt_discount_rate as optDiscountRate, opt_discount_price as optDiscountPrice from (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ticket_no, opt_title, opt_price, opt_discount_rate, opt_discount_price, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY ticket_no ORDER BY opt_discount_rate DESC) AS rn FROM ticket_option ) WHERE rn = 1 order by opt_discount_price desc) where rownum <= #{readNo} )odr on (tinfo.ticketNo = odr.ticketNo)
select ticket_filepath1 as ticketFilepath1 from ticket_file where ticket_no = #{ticketNo}

select * from (select c2.category_name as parentCategoryName, l1.local_name as localName, l2.local_name as parentLocalName, ticket_no as ticketNo, ticket_title as ticketTitle, required_time as requiredTime, ticket_score as ticketScore from ticket t join ticket_Category c1 on (t.category_id = c1.category_id) join ticket_category c2 on (c1.parent_category_id = c2.category_id) join local_category l1 on (t.local_id = l1.local_id) join local_category l2 on (l1.parent_local_id = l2.local_id))tinfo join (select ticket_no as ticketNo, opt_title as optTitle, opt_price as optPrice, opt_discount_rate as optDiscountRate, opt_discount_price as optDiscountPrice from (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ticket_no, opt_title, opt_price, opt_discount_rate, opt_discount_price, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY ticket_no ORDER BY opt_discount_rate DESC) AS rn FROM ticket_option ) WHERE rn = 1 order by opt_discount_price desc))odr on (tinfo.ticketNo = odr.ticketNo) where localName LIKE '%'||#{searchStr}||'%' or parentLocalName like '%'||#{searchStr}||'%' or ticketTitle like '%'||#{searchStr}||'%'
select local_filepath as localFilepath from local_category where local_name=#{parentLocalName}
